attacks.name: Tentacle Grip
attacks.text: Flip a number of coins equal to the number of Water Energy cards attached to Tentacruel. For each heads, draw 2 cards.

attacks.name: Poison Sting
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.
